detailed_description: A deep learning model for medical image segmentation, specifically designed for polyp detection in colonoscopy images using multi-scale edge-guided attention mechanisms.

name: Meganet.m
one_line_profile: MATLAB library for Deep Learning as Optimal Control (SciML)
detailed_description: A MATLAB framework implementing deep learning architectures as discretized optimal control problems (ODEs), widely used in scientific machine learning and inverse problems.

name: EnvRtype
one_line_profile: R toolkit for environmental characterization and genomic prediction
detailed_description: An R package for collecting environmental data from GIS platforms and performing environmental characterization, specifically designed for genomic prediction of reaction norms in ecology and breeding.

name: Rexgen Direct

detailed_description: A data-driven, template-free approach for predicting the outcomes of organic chemical reactions. It treats reaction prediction as a graph-to-graph translation problem, identifying reaction centers and generating product structures directly from reactant graphs without relying on predefined reaction templates.

name: SolTranNet
one_line_profile: Aqueous solubility prediction using molecular transformers
detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting the aqueous solubility of organic molecules. It utilizes a Transformer-based architecture adapted for SMILES strings to estimate LogS values, aiding in drug discovery and chemical property screening.

name: MALT
one_line_profile: High-throughput sequence alignment tool for metagenomics
detailed_description: MALT (MEGAN Alignment Tool) is a sequence alignment and analysis tool designed for processing high-throughput sequencing data, specifically for metagenomic analysis.

name: MEGAN Community Edition
one_line_profile: Interactive tool for metagenomic data analysis and visualization
detailed_description: MEGAN (MEtaGenome ANalyzer) is a comprehensive toolbox for interactively analyzing and comparing microbiome data, allowing users to explore the taxonomic and functional content of their data.

name: GREAD
one_line_profile: Graph Neural Reaction-Diffusion Networks for modeling dynamic systems
detailed_description: GREAD implements a graph neural network framework designed to model reaction-diffusion processes, applicable to physics and chemical dynamics simulations.

name: synthesis-dags

detailed_description: Implements an approach to search over molecule synthesis Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs), facilitating single-step and multi-step retrosynthesis planning.

name: LocalTransform

detailed_description: LocalTransform is a template-free reaction prediction model that predicts organic reactivity by learning local graph transformations.

name: MolTrans

detailed_description: MolTrans is a deep learning framework that uses substructure pattern mining and interaction modeling to predict drug-target interactions.

name: Deep-Synthesis
one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for chemical synthesis prediction
detailed_description: A framework utilizing sequence-to-sequence models for predicting chemical reaction outcomes and retrosynthetic pathways.

name: MoleculeDiffusionTransformer

detailed_description: A model for generating molecular structures combining diffusion models with autoregressive transformer architectures, developed at MIT.

name: RXNGraphormer

detailed_description: Official implementation of RXNGraphormer, a pre-trained deep learning framework designed for cross-task chemical reaction performance prediction and synthesis planning.

name: Transformer-M

name: Graphormer

detailed_description: Graphormer is a graph transformer model designed as a general-purpose backbone for various molecular modeling tasks, including property prediction and conformational analysis.

name: MEGAN (Molecule Edit Graph Attention Network)

detailed_description: MEGAN models chemical reactions by predicting a sequence of graph edits to transform reactants into products, useful for reaction prediction.

name: citationchaser

detailed_description: An R package and Shiny app for performing forward and backward citation chasing as part of an evidence synthesis project, helping researchers identify relevant literature.

name: nerfacc

name: nerfstudio

name: Difix3D

detailed_description: A tool for improving 3D reconstructions using single-step diffusion models, specifically addressing artifacts in 3D geometry generation.

name: TransVAE

name: PDEBench

name: MultiStepRetrosynthesisTTL

name: rxn_yields

detailed_description: A library for predicting chemical reaction yields using machine learning models, including data augmentation strategies to improve prediction accuracy.

name: mist

name: HiCOPS

detailed_description: HiCOPS is a computational framework for peptide identification from mass spectrometry data, featuring an accelerated database search mechanism.

name: IDSL.UFA

detailed_description: IDSL.UFA is a tool for United Formula Annotation (UFA) designed for processing and annotating Liquid Chromatography High-Resolution Mass Spectrometry (LC-HRMS) data.

name: InstaNovo

detailed_description: InstaNovo performs de novo peptide sequencing, enabling accurate, database-free peptide identification for large-scale proteomics experiments.

name: MS2Query
one_line_profile: Machine learning assisted library querying of MS/MS spectra
detailed_description: MS2Query uses machine learning to assist in library querying of MS/MS spectra, improving the identification of molecules in mass spectrometry data.

name: MetFamily

detailed_description: MetFamily is a web application and methodology for the untargeted discovery of metabolite families, offering a bird's eye view of metabolic regulation in comparative metabolomics studies.

name: lc-ms-d3js

detailed_description: A tool for Tandem Mass Spectrometry Analysis and visualization, providing an interactive mass spectrum graph over the web using d3js.

name: olssen

detailed_description: OLSSEN (OnLine Spectral Search ENgine) is designed for processing Proteomics big data using Apache Spark, Python/Flask, and AngularJS.

name: SlicerMassVision
one_line_profile: 3D Slicer module for mass spectrometry imaging analysis
detailed_description: SlicerMassVision is a module for 3D Slicer that enables end-to-end analysis of mass spectrometry imaging (MSI) data.

name: metID
one_line_profile: Database construction and metabolite identification
detailed_description: metID is an R package used to construct databases and identify metabolites from mass spectrometry data.

name: iDOM

detailed_description: iDOM provides tools for the statistical analysis of dissolved organic matter (DOM) based on high-resolution mass spectrometry (HRMS) data.

name: PepTrust

detailed_description: A probabilistic framework designed to improve the confidence of peptide identification in proteomics by leveraging semi-supervised learning and decoy fusion strategies.

name: deep_metab
one_line_profile: Deep learning methods for metabolite identification in LC-MS
detailed_description: A research implementation applying deep learning techniques to Liquid Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS) metabolomics data to enhance metabolite identification accuracy.

name: mass2adduct

detailed_description: An R package for the analysis and identification of matrix-metabolite adducts in MALDI mass spectrometry imaging (MSI) datasets, helping to distinguish biological signals from matrix artifacts.

detailed_description: A workflow wrapper that containerizes MaxQuant using Singularity and orchestrates execution with Snakemake, enabling scalable and reproducible mass spectrometry data analysis on Linux computing clusters.

name: BoltzMatch
one_line_profile: Machine-learning scoring for peptide-spectrum matching
detailed_description: A machine-learning-based scoring method for peptide-spectrum matching (PSM) in tandem mass spectrometry shotgun proteomics, designed to improve identification accuracy.

name: MS_targeted

detailed_description: An open-source command-line pipeline designed for the statistical analysis and processing of targeted mass spectrometry metabolomics data.

name: iACVP

detailed_description: A computational tool for the identification and prediction of anti-coronavirus peptides using sequence-based features and machine learning.

name: Sage
one_line_profile: High-performance proteomics search and quantification engine
detailed_description: An extremely fast, open-source proteomics search engine and quantification tool written in Rust, supporting isobaric labeling, label-free quantification, and various mass spectrometry workflows.

name: DeepDIA
one_line_profile: Deep learning for in silico spectral library generation in DIA
detailed_description: A deep learning framework for generating in silico spectral libraries to support Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) mass spectrometry analysis, improving peptide identification without experimental libraries.

name: ProteoLizard-AlgorithmToolkit

name: ORIGAMI

detailed_description: A software suite designed for the analysis and visualization of activated ion mobility mass spectrometry (IM-MS) data, supporting collision cross-section (CCS) calculations and unfolding plots.

name: PEAKS Online

detailed_description: A distributed computing platform designed for high-throughput, parallel protein and peptide identification from DDA and DIA mass spectrometry data.

name: Maia

name: dripToolkit

name: ephemeris

name: patRoon

It utilizes a multi-scale convolutional neural network architecture to extract features from peptide sequences and predict their antimicrobial activity, aiding in the discovery of new therapeutic agents.

It incorporates structural evolution mining to analyze and discover potential AMPs.
